attributes.action: Request that John Sergeant be allowed to compete fairly in Strictly Come Dancing without being bullied, or ridiculed, and that the judges should make a public apology to all those who voted for John Sergeant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Sergeant has entertained the viewing public throughout this series of Strictly Come Dancing. The British public have shown their great ability to support the underdog in a contest, see through the bitter barbs of the judges and demonstrate the greatest of British traits – namely their sense of humour. The BBC should be ashamed that even a simple, Saturday evening family show has descend into farce.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
